title: Regional distribution of social network users worldwide 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of social media users in the y axis.
The Share of social media users is appeared to be the highest at Country East Asia and lowest at Country Central Asia.
The Share of social media users of Country East Asia is 33.0% larger than the minimum value at Central Asia.
min_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of social media users in each Country on the y axis.
The Share of social media users is highest at Country East Asia and lowest at Country Central Asia.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of social media users in the y axis.
The Share of social media users is appeared to be the highest at Country East Asia and lowest at Country Central Asia.
The Share of social media users of Country East Asia is 33.0% larger than the minimum value at Central Asia.
max_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of social media users in each Country on the y axis.
Country East Asia has the highest Share of social media users and Central Asia has the lowest Share of social media users.
Country  has the second highest value for Share of social media users.
The difference of Share of social media users between the highest and lowest Country is 32.0.
Share of social media users at Country East Asia is 33.0 , second place is  at 33.0, and thirdly is South Asia at 9.0.
Similar Share of social media users is found in Country South America, and South Asia.
Considered together, the average Share of social media users in all 12 Countrys is roughly 8.33.
The Share of social media users is 100.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
